wid.title: World Inequality Database (WID)
wid.description: Largest open database on global inequality, founded by Thomas Piketty, Emmanuel Saez, and Gabriel Zucman.

oecd-idd.title: OECD Income Distribution Database
oecd-idd.description: Cross-country data on income inequality and poverty for OECD member states.

lis.title: Luxembourg Income Study (LIS) Database
lis.description: Microdata archive for household income, wealth, expenditure, and labor statistics.

soep.title: Socio-Economic Panel (SOEP)
soep.description: Longitudinal household survey in Germany since 1984, covering income, wealth, labor, and living conditions.

inkar.title: INKAR – Indicators and Maps for Spatial and Urban Development
inkar.description: Interactive maps on income, poverty, education, and labor market in Germany down to district level.

genesis.title: GENESIS-Online (Destatis)
genesis.description: Official German database with regional statistics on income, poverty, and social conditions.

armutsbericht.title: Poverty and Wealth Report of the German Federal Government
armutsbericht.description: Regular report by the German federal government on poverty and wealth distribution.

wsi.title: WSI Distribution Reports
wsi.description: Regular inequality and distribution reports by the Hans-Böckler Foundation.
